mapper.sql: select details_id, quotation_id, equipment_num, product_line_id, model_id, material_id, number, rinse_solution_id, other_expenses, other_expenses_description, rated_flow, lift, operating_temperature, fluid_density, inlet_pressure, npsh, motor_supplier_id, motor_id, other_motor, other_motor_price, machine_supplier_id, machine_id, other_machine, other_machine_price, coupling_supplier_id, coupling_id, other_coupling, other_coupling_price, quotation_type ,coefficient ,details_price from busi_quotation_details
mapper.select:
SELECT details_id, quotation_id, equipment_num, product_line_id, (SELECT product_line_name FROM busi_product_line bpl WHERE bpl.product_line_id = bqd.product_line_id) AS product_line_name , model_id, (SELECT model_name FROM busi_product_model bpm WHERE bpm.model_id = bqd.model_id) AS model_name , material_supplier_id, (SELECT material_name FROM material_supplier ms WHERE ms.supplier_id = bqd.material_supplier_id ) AS material_supplier_name, motor_id, material_id, (SELECT bt.texture_name FROM busi_material_production bmp LEFT JOIN busi_texture bt ON bmp.`texture_id` = bt.texture_id WHERE bmp.material_id = bqd.material_id) AS material_name , number, rinse_solution_id, other_expenses, other_expenses_description, rated_flow, lift, operating_temperature, fluid_density, inlet_pressure, npsh, motor_supplier_id, (SELECT material_name FROM material_supplier ms WHERE ms.supplier_id = bqd.motor_supplier_id ) AS motor_supplier_name, motor_id, (SELECT motor_model FROM busi_motor bu WHERE bu.motor_id = bqd.motor_id) AS motor_name, other_motor, other_motor_price, (SELECT material_name FROM material_supplier ms WHERE ms.supplier_id = bqd.machine_supplier_id ) AS machine_supplier_name, machine_supplier_id, (SELECT material_name FROM material_supplier ms WHERE ms.supplier_id = bqd.machine_supplier_id ) AS machine_supplier_name, machine_id, (SELECT machine_model FROM busi_machine bm WHERE bm.machine_id = bqd.machine_id) AS machine_model, other_machine, other_machine_price, coupling_supplier_id, (SELECT material_name FROM material_supplier ms WHERE ms.supplier_id = bqd.coupling_supplier_id ) AS coupling_supplier_name, coupling_id, (SELECT coupling_model FROM busi_coupling bc WHERE bc.coupling_id = bqd.coupling_id) AS coupling_name, other_coupling, other_coupling_price, bearing_supplier_id, (SELECT material_name FROM material_supplier ms WHERE ms.supplier_id = bqd.bearing_supplier_id ) AS bearing_supplier_name, bearing_id, (SELECT bearing_model FROM busi_bearing bb WHERE bb.bearing_id = bqd.bearing_id) AS bearing_name, other_bearing, other_bearing_price, quotation_type, coefficient, details_price FROM busi_quotation_details bqd
and bqd.quotation_id = #{quotationId}

SELECT details_id, quotation_id, equipment_num, product_line_id, (SELECT product_line_name FROM busi_product_line bpl WHERE bpl.product_line_id = bqd.product_line_id) AS product_line_name , model_id, (SELECT model_name FROM busi_product_model bpm WHERE bpm.model_id = bqd.model_id) AS model_name , material_supplier_id, (SELECT material_name FROM material_supplier ms WHERE ms.supplier_id = bqd.material_supplier_id ) AS material_supplier_name, motor_id, material_id, (SELECT bt.texture_name FROM busi_material_production bmp LEFT JOIN busi_texture bt ON bmp.`texture_id` = bt.texture_id WHERE bmp.material_id = bqd.material_id) AS material_name , number, rinse_solution_id, other_expenses, other_expenses_description, rated_flow, lift, operating_temperature, fluid_density, inlet_pressure, npsh, motor_supplier_id, (SELECT material_name FROM material_supplier ms WHERE ms.supplier_id = bqd.motor_supplier_id ) AS motor_supplier_name, motor_id, (SELECT motor_model FROM busi_motor bu WHERE bu.motor_id = bqd.motor_id) AS motor_name, other_motor, other_motor_price, (SELECT material_name FROM material_supplier ms WHERE ms.supplier_id = bqd.machine_supplier_id ) AS machine_supplier_name, machine_supplier_id, (SELECT material_name FROM material_supplier ms WHERE ms.supplier_id = bqd.machine_supplier_id ) AS machine_supplier_name, machine_id, (SELECT machine_model FROM busi_machine bm WHERE bm.machine_id = bqd.machine_id) AS machine_model, other_machine, other_machine_price, coupling_supplier_id, (SELECT material_name FROM material_supplier ms WHERE ms.supplier_id = bqd.coupling_supplier_id ) AS coupling_supplier_name, coupling_id, (SELECT coupling_model FROM busi_coupling bc WHERE bc.coupling_id = bqd.coupling_id) AS coupling_name, other_coupling, other_coupling_price, bearing_supplier_id, (SELECT material_name FROM material_supplier ms WHERE ms.supplier_id = bqd.bearing_supplier_id ) AS bearing_supplier_name, bearing_id, (SELECT bearing_model FROM busi_bearing bb WHERE bb.bearing_id = bqd.bearing_id) AS bearing_name, other_bearing, other_bearing_price, quotation_type, coefficient, details_price FROM busi_quotation_details bqd where bqd.details_id = #{detailsId}
mapper.insert:
insert into busi_quotation_details
quotation_id, equipment_num, product_line_id, model_id, material_supplier_id, material_id, number, rinse_solution_id, other_expenses, other_expenses_description, rated_flow, lift, operating_temperature, fluid_density, inlet_pressure, npsh, motor_supplier_id, motor_id, other_motor, other_motor_price, machine_supplier_id, machine_id, other_machine, other_machine_price, coupling_supplier_id, coupling_id, other_coupling, other_coupling_price, quotation_type, coefficient, details_price, bearing_supplier_id, bearing_id, other_bearing_supplier, other_bearing_price,
#{quotationId}, #{equipmentNum}, #{productLineId}, #{modelId}, #{materialSupplierId}, #{materialId}, #{number}, #{rinseSolutionId}, #{otherExpenses}, #{otherExpensesDescription}, #{ratedFlow}, #{lift}, #{operatingTemperature}, #{fluidDensity}, #{inletPressure}, #{npsh}, #{motorSupplierId}, #{motorId}, #{otherMotor}, #{otherMotorPrice}, #{machineSupplierId}, #{machineId}, #{otherMachine}, #{otherMachinePrice}, #{couplingSupplierId}, #{couplingId}, #{otherCoupling}, #{otherCouplingPrice}, #{quotationType}, #{coefficient}, #{detailsPrice}, #{bearingSupplierId}, #{bearingId}, #{otherBearingSupplier}, #{otherBearingPrice},
mapper.delete:
delete from busi_quotation_details where details_id in
#{detailsId}
mapper.select: SELECT bpp.weight ,bt.`mass_ratio` as massRatio ,bmp.`price` as materialPrice,bpp.time ,bpp.is_current as isCurrent FROM `busi_product_parameter` bpp LEFT JOIN busi_texture bt ON bpp.`texture_id` = bt.`texture_id` LEFT JOIN `busi_material_production` bmp ON bt.`texture_id` = bmp.`texture_id` WHERE bpp.`model_id` = #{modelId} AND bmp.`supplier_id` = #{materialSupplierId}
SELECT price FROM busi_motor where motor_id = #{motorId}
SELECT machine_Price FROM busi_machine where machine_id = #{machineId }
SELECT coupling_price FROM busi_coupling where coupling_id = #{couplingId}
SELECT bearing_price FROM busi_bearing where bearing_id = #{bearingId}
SELECT SUM(details_price*coefficient * number) FROM busi_quotation_details WHERE quotation_id = #{quotationId}
SELECT SUM(details_price*coefficient * number) FROM busi_outsourcing_details WHERE quotation_id = #{quotationId}
SELECT SUM(details_price * number) FROM busi_parts_details WHERE quotation_id = #{quotationId}

SELECT COUNT(1) AS bod_count, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM busi_quotation_details bqd WHERE bqd.quotation_id = #{quotationId} ) AS bqd_count, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM busi_parts_details bpd WHERE bpd.quotation_id = #{quotationId} ) AS bpd_count FROM busi_outsourcing_details bod WHERE bod.`quotation_id` = #{quotationId}
